channel.title: Help with getting started with 317
channel.description: whats a good base i could use thats 317 and items all work with silab client? cuz i tryed useing a tut and it didnt help and i tryed codeing to get my server like that and it failed

item.title: Help with getting started with 317
item.dc:creator: @ritualSaint ritualSaint
item.description:

can anyone give me a link to the latest all-star scape?

item.title: Help with getting started with 317
item.dc:creator: @sexy_bobert sexy bobert
item.description:
@sexy_bobert wrote:

[quote="_Vengeance, post:9, topic:259388"][quote author=sexy bobert link=topic=342517.msg2648363#msg2648363 date=1233381634]
That source may be hard for a new coder… it’s kinda empty in my opinion. But, whatever. When you start, I think its better to just learn the basics, changing text, moving and adding npc’s, making npc’s talk, adding drops all the real basic than… This would be a perfect source.
[/quote]Well… I have no clue what that source is So, I’ll just stick with what I said before (Even though I’m sure this guy hasn’t waited this long to get a source.) Allstar-Scape would probably be the best source to get you started.

Anyone wanting to learn should be opting to use Yz85Racer’s base as a guide to get started with, without having to do all the I/O and client managing on their own.[/quote][br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 31, 2009, 12:13:49 am[/size][hr]Ha, that last one I posted was screwed up, but I think you get my point. (By the way, I’m not arguing with you, we’re having a friendly dispute :)…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with getting started with 317

Anyone wanting to learn should be opting to use Yz85Racer’s base as a guide to get started with, without having to do all the I/O and client managing on their own.

That source may be hard for a new coder… it’s kinda empty in my opinion. But, whatever. When you start, I think its better to just learn the basics, changing text, moving and adding npc’s, making npc’s talk, adding drops all the real basic than… This would be a perfect source.

item.description:
@sexy_bobert wrote:

Yeah allstar would be best, working ::ipban command, easy and simple coding. If you consider figment, I suggest you dont because Ip banning doesnt work. Even if u enter there ip manually in the ip ban file… so keep that in mind
